name: Taoreta: Alternative (v0.04)
description:
A game I've worked on for a while, it's nowhere near done, but it's a good start.

Coming in 0.05, I plan to add a few more areas, and start working on a weapon upgrade system, adding spells, making firearms more efficient, adding some merchants around the world,  add character cosmetics for more customization, and starting work on an items menu. 

The game seems to crash often, I'm trying to work on this.
